Hi! My name is Candace Chang. I've gone by Candy since my sister came up with that name while eating candy in the hospital.

I'm a recent UC Berkeley graduate with a fancy-sounding simultaneous degree in Computer Science and Business Administration. I'm interested in studying and shaping people's experiences.

Feel free to browse through my portfolio, and check out my resume on LinkedIn.
